name: Sacrilicious
description:
Sacrilicious

Another peaceful day draws to a close on the island.

As high priest, the tribespeople always gather at this time to listen to you deliver the word of the volcano god.

Often, these tales are ones of happiness, of helping those in need and filling your heart so full of love that no hate can enter it. Tales the tribespeople remember for generations.

But tonight, they'll remember you for a different reason.

--------

 A & D/Left & Right: Move
 Space: Pick up/throw

--------

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 43 "Sacrifices Must be Made"
WebGL version has some timing issues with the music tracks, please download the binaries for the optimal experience!
